title: Bella Hadid flashes her flat abs in slouchy stripes while Gigi mirrors her style in casual pinks
text:
They're both some of the world's top models.

Bella and Gigi Hadid proved that sisters certainly share the same style when they stepped out in New York on Friday.

While the ladies were out younger sister Bella flaunted her flat abs in a striped ensemble which was only buttoned at the top.

Chic: Bella Hadid looked stylish while out with her sister Gigi in the NoHo neighborhood of New York on Friday

Easy-going: Both ladies rocked their own version of slouchy separates

Her belly-baring top was teamed with low slung trousers and chunky boots.

The star was in full makeup but hid her dramatic eyeshadow behind tiny oval shades. Still, her pout was perfectly painted in a rich nude.

Meanwhile sister Gigi took after Bella's casual style in her own athleisure.

The right stripes: Younger sister Bella flaunted her flat abs in a striped ensemble which was only buttoned at the top

Pink chic: Gigi took after Bella's casual style in her own athleisure

Her soft pink look was from Reebok, whom Hadid is a brand ambassador for.

Underneath her track suit she layered on chunky chains.

Gigi was also made up, looking like a blushing beauty behind her sunglasses.

The sisterly outing comes after Gigi's ex Tyler Cameron opened up about their friendship.

Representing: Her soft pink look was from Reebok, whom Hadid is a brand ambassador for

The general contractor, 26, dished about dating a celebrity in a chat with Us Weekly at the grand opening of the Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Hollywood, Florida, on Thursday.

'It was just a different world… I never navigated it before,' admitted the part-time model. 'They are no different than anyone else.'

He and the model, 24, are in touch 'when we need to be. … We’re friends,' Tyler continued.
description: Bella and Gigi Hadid proved that sisters certainly share the same style when they stepped out in New York on Friday. While the ladies were out younger sister Bella flaunted her flat abs.
